title: How does Chegg India select an expert? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several Steps through which Chegg Select it's Experts.The Steps are described below:- Registration:- Open the Chegg India Website and Type type Phone number in the Column. You will then redirected to General Information Page. Type your Name, Email, Password and Continue the process. Then a confirmation Message will be sent to your Email. Click on that link and you will. be redirected to your Registration Page.Acceptance of Terms and Conditions:- Chegg India wants to do their work in a very fair way. This is the reason, they provide you will Terms and Conditions. Read them and Accept them and Continue the process.Registration:- Registration Includes, your General details and subject you want to apply as an expert. Be sure before applying to a Subject as Chegg is very strict in Changing or Adding any subject to you dashboard.Subject Test:- This Includes a total of 12 questions out of which you have to score atleast 60% in order to pass it. One Advantage of this test is that, there is no time limit. So if you were not sure about some questions, then you can take Help from Internet.Guidelines Test:- According to me, it is most crucial and Important Test as a Chegg Expert as your Journey at Chegg is totally dependent on How you were Following the Guidelines. So, Download the Guidelines pdf. Read it carefully for 5–10 minutes. Put your Main Focus on “Honor Code” Section. Once you have read and Understand the test, Go through the Guideline test. It contains a total of 20 Questions out of which 70–80% should be correct.Documents Verification:- Keep a Scanned Picture of your Aadhar Card(as Address Proof), Your College ID or Marksheet as Education proof before starting the registration. Try to resize both the Picture upto 2MB. Upload it when required.Bank Verification and PAN Card:- This is also one of the crucial step in registation. If you Don't have PAN card, then Apply it as soon as you can as it has now become Mandotary Process. Keep a scanned photo of PAN card upto 2MB. Upload it. The Income will be transferred to you bank account directly Through NEFT. You have to Provide Account Holder Name, Bank Account Number, IFSC Code in order to complete the step. After this step you will recieve Re 1 from Chegg India. Consider it as confirmation for your Bank Details.Mobile Number and E-mail Verification:- This is the last step of your registration. You will receive a OTP at your Email and Phone number. Type it and Complete your Registration.Note:- Don't Try to make fool of Chegg as You should be known about the Fact that, Everything at Chegg is Computer based and any issue regarding Registration will be detected within seconds. Don't try to make second Account with same Phone number or Bank Details. →→ After Completion of all the steps, you will get a confirmation Email from Chegg. You will receive a confirmation Email regarding your Onboarding Details and Grant of Answering privilege. Note:- I am not giving any assurity about, how much time it may take to receive Confirmation E-mail, when your Answering privilege will be granted. The Reason is, when I applied for it in June, I came to know that my Answering Rights will be granted within 15-days of registration but I was Granted it 3 months after Registration (in September). →→Keep Visiting your Email for regular updates as Almost 90% of communication will be done through Email. Only 10% will be done through Whatsapp Group and SMS. Communication Includes your payment details, Badge Allocation, COMIS Review, Any Comment from Students etc. So, Start the Chegg Journey and get a Chance to Earn Money as well as knowledge. Hope this will Help 🙏🙏🙏

There is proper selection procedure in CHEGG India. There are two tests you have to qualify to be a chegg expert: Subject Test : In this test 10 MCQs will b asked and questions will be GATE level if you are from Engineering , You have to score more than 90% in this test. In first attempt if you don't clear the test then you will have one more attempt to qualify and unfortunately if you make it this time again then your candidature will be revoked.Q&A Guideline Test : This test is very easy but essential to be an expert. I want to make it very clear that only after qualifying the subject test you can give this test. First they will mail you Q& A guideline ( Question & Answering guideline ) then you will be tested how effieciently you can answer questions.After clearing both the tests acknowledgemrnt letter will be sent to your mail and after scanning the letter you to sign the terms and conditions of CHEGG and revert in the mail. Once this procedure is done you will get username and password in 1–2 working days where you have to upload your bank details and then you will be a Cheggster. All the best, keep learning and keep earning Note: Don't forget to upvote the answer of you find this useful. PS: Thanks for 200+ Upvotes
